attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Save Manchester Adoption Society!
Manchester Adoption Society has existed for 44 years helping children find a family.  It is now threatened with closure due to lack of funds.
Adoption is a vital service.
More than 4000 children are awaiting adoption.  We call on the government to give a much needed cash injection of £500 000 and also increase the fees so that Adoption Agencies can break even.
Every child not adopted costs £25000 each for care and much more in long term costs- the real human cost is incalculable.
If the banks can be bailed out then this society and others like it can and must be saved.
